title: French Vegan Society
description: The French Vegan Society is a non-profit ethical and educative organization, dealing with health and environmental issues as well as social exclusion, animal exploitation, consumers' information and anything related to veganism. It covers presenting factual information to authorities and the public, supporting vegans and helping anybody wanting to pledge too.
streetAddress: House Associations of the 2nd District, Mailbox 2-23, Rue Greneta
